1.des: Every Mod of this Ultimate Skillchain reaches Lv. 20 (excluding Warp skills).

2.des: Select the Ultimate Skillchain: %s and clear any stage 15 times.

3.des: Select the Ultimate Skillchain: %s and clear any Nightmare Abyss boss of Outphase Level or above in Recurring Dream 4 times.

4.des: Select the Ultimate Skillchain: %s and clear any Hazard Zone Cleaning stage of Difficulty VII or above 5 times. (Recommended Level: 70-80)

5.des: Every Mod of this Ultimate Skillchain reaches Lv. 35 (excluding Warp skills).

6.des: Select the Ultimate Skillchain: %s and clear any boss on Difficulty 4 or above in Distorted Dreams II, Recurring Dream 4 times.

7.des: Select the Ultimate Skillchain: %s and clear any Hazard Zone Cleaning stage of Difficulty Î© Grudge Level 10 or above 10 times. (Recommended Level: 70-80)
